verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: And what will make you understand what the Shocker is?
On that day, the people will be like scattered moths.
And the mountains will resemble carded wool.
As for him whose scales are heavy.
He will experience a life of contentment.
But as for he whose scales are light.
His mother will be an Abyss.
And what could explain to you what that is?
